Class GameWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • GameWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class GameWindow
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.io.Serializable
    GameWindow class. It extends from JFrame, implements ActionListener to check for certain button pushes and implements Serializable to save the actual game.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameWindow

        public GameWindow(java.lang.String difficulty)
        The main initialization of the GameWindow. It either initializes a new window with the difficulty, or loads a saved game.
        Parameters:
        difficulty - - the diff variable gets the difficulty from the GameStartMenu

      • gameWindowIni

        public void gameWindowIni(java.lang.String difficulty)
        The game window initializer. It creates a window with the given difficulty.
        Parameters:
        difficulty - the difficulty of the game

      • revealAll

        public void revealAll()
        The function to reveal all not revealed or not flagged cells. It is used at the end of a game.

      • cellsAroundOne

        public Cell[] cellsAroundOne(int x,
                             int y)
        This function is used to set the cells around each cell. The returned array is used to set the neighbouringCells variable in Cells class.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of a cell
        y - the y coordinate of a cell
        Returns:
        Cell[] cellsAround - an array of cells around one cell.

      • saveGame

        public void saveGame(GameWindow wind)
        This function is used to write the GameWindow out into a txt (SavedGame.txt). Always one saved game, if the txt contains one already, it overwrites it.
        Parameters:
        wind - the GameWindow which we save

      • loadGame

        public void loadGame()
        This function is used to load a game.
